description.text:
(Translated from Chinese by AI)
1. New Feature: Adjust TouchController mod vibration strength in the launcher settings.
2. New Feature: Access mod loader download links within the launcher.
3. Made adjustments to some UI elements.
4. Modified the GL4ES description. (Note: GL4ES supports versions up to 1.21.4 and will not function properly after 1.21.5)

（若启动器内下载缓慢请使用网盘下载,64位的请下载arm64，不知道该下哪个的请下载all）
1.新增功能：在启动器设置内调节TouchController模组震动强度
2.新增功能：在启动器内获取模组加载器下载链接
3.调整部分UI
4.修改GL4ES描述（注意：GL4ES支持的版本最高为1.21.4，1.21.5后无法正常使用）
